function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fall in energy demand, especially for oil","Impact":"Economic downturn, job losses, and reduced revenue for energy companies","Mitigation":"Diversification of energy sources, investment in renewable energy, and government support for affected industries","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage solutions, and energy efficiency measures","People":"Energy workers, industry professionals, and communities reliant on energy production","Owner":"Government, energy companies, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Constrained global production of liquefied natural gas","Impact":"Reduced revenue for natural gas producers, financial losses, and job insecurity","Mitigation":"Diversification of export markets, development of alternative uses for natural gas, and investment in energy innovation","Technologies":"Natural gas storage and transportation technologies, renewable natural gas production, and energy efficiency solutions","People":"Natural gas industry workers, global energy consumers, and investors in natural gas markets","Owner":"Natural gas companies, energy policymakers, and international trade organizations"},{"Description":"Disruption of supply chains for energy production facilities","Impact":"Delayed construction projects, increased costs, and reduced capacity for renewable energy production","Mitigation":"Localizing supply chains, investment in domestic production, and technological innovation for energy infrastructure","Technologies":"Digital supply chain management, additive manufacturing, and advanced construction technologies","People":"Energy project developers, construction workers, and renewable energy investors","Owner":"Energy companies, construction firms, and government agencies"}]}
